entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `dotnet new consoledi` project template #42517
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to build CleanArchitecture2 app with an error "CS0619:'MudMenu.OffsetY' is obsolete: 'Use AnchorOrigin or TransformOrigin instead.'" #42509
  • Reenable Crossgen Tests #42506
  • Running aspire project with only SDK 9.0 P6 / 9.0 P7 fails: "You must install or update .NET to run this application." #42505

Closed

  • Make it easier to work with the SDK components and installers #23357
    9.0.1xx
  • Not specifying a value for the --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` results in InvalidOperationException #25867
    9.0.1xx
  • Merge installer repo into SDK #24415
    9.0.1xx
  • Would it be possible to pick a fix for https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/2671? #28547
    9.0.1xx
  • Redistribute the portable RID graph from the Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms transport package #35750
    9.0.1xx
  • Merge .net format repo into SDK or roslyn repos #35915
    9.0.1xx
  • Figure out which package other repos should use to subscribe to the sdk version #41156
    9.0.1xx
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to build grandnode2 app with source generate file errors and unexpected RZ1031&CS0102 errors #42510
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publish blazorwasm project failed with clang.exe-System Error "The code execution cannot proceed because MSVCP140.dll" was not found... #42147

PullRequests

Created

  • Drop FirstTimeMessageAspNetCertificateLinux #42519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find all workloads! Even if they're in another feature band Fixes #42502 #42513
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation #42508
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Update Skip Attribute to Issue Link for Crossgen Tests #42507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Exclude bincore directory in diff test #42498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sidestep telemetry null writing by writing empty strings #42499
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Handle Test Information from the New Testing Platform #42494
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
